programme.title: 逆転人生「あの日“加害者”になった私 東電社員たちの10年」[解][字][再]
programme.desc: 原発事故後、賠償や除染などのため福島に赴任した3人の東京電力社員たち。被災者の怒りや悲しみに触れ、苦悩しながら奮闘した10年間。山里・丸山桂里奈が涙した物語。.(n)

programme.title: 【よるドラ】ここは今から倫理です。（7）[解][字][再]
programme.desc: 新時代の“よるドラ”は全く新しい学園ドラマ。山田裕貴演じるミステリアスでクールな倫理教師が悩める高校生の問題に立ち向かう。「この『倫理』は人生の必修科目です！」.(n)

programme.title: SONGS「aiko」[字][再]
programme.desc: aikoがSONGSに登場。大泉洋との初対談が実現。普段にもまして在宅時間が多くなったaikoに有意義な「おうち時間」の過ごし方を教えてもらう。.(n)

programme.title: NHKスペシャル 選 廃炉への道2019「核燃料デブリとの闘いが始まった」[字]
programme.desc: 福島第一原発の事故で出た「核燃料デブリ」。それに初めて触れる調査が行われた。廃炉最大の壁・デブリの正体に迫るとともに、地元の住民が廃炉をどう見つめているかを描く.(n)

programme.title: 世界をつなぐ「花は咲く」
programme.desc: 東日本大震災から10年、復興支援ソング「花は咲く」の多言語版が誕生。May J．、森崎ウィン、小野リサなど国内外のアーティストが、11言語で未来への希望を歌う。.(n)

programme.title: ダーウィンが来た！10min．「アマゾン奥地で発見！秘密の怪魚ワールド」[字]
programme.desc: アマゾン奥地の“清流”で、巨大な怪魚たちの暮らしぶりに迫る。“淡水のシーラカンス”とも呼ばれる幻の巨大魚タライロンやデンキウナギなど、驚きの怪魚ワールドに潜入！.(n)

programme.title: ダーウィンが来た！10min．「巨大ゾウ キリマンジャロを登る！」[字]
programme.desc: アフリカ最高峰キリマンジャロにゾウが登るといううわさの真相に迫るため取材班が山中を大探索。すると動物たちが続々と集まる奇妙な場所を発見！世界初スクープで迫る。.(n)

programme.title: ダーウィンが来た！10min．「まんまる！ 謎のマヌルネコ」[字]
programme.desc: ぽっちゃりモフモフのマヌルネコ。地面にだらりと寝そべる天敵対策や、しっぽを振って獲物のネズミの動きを止める狩りなど超個性的なワザを目撃！まんまるネコの謎に迫る。.(n)

programme.title: ダーウィンが来た！10min．「巨大イグアナ 大繁栄の秘密」[字]
programme.desc: まるで恐竜！全長2mにもなるグリーンイグアナ。最も繁栄したトカゲと言われる。秘密を探ると、葉っぱ専門の食生活や意表をつく天敵対策などユニークな生態を次々に目撃！.(n)

programme.title: マヌ〜ルのゆうべ ふしぎな生きもの大集合「シクリッド」[字]
programme.desc: 日曜夜の「ダーウィンが来た！」から生まれたミニアニメ「マヌ〜ルのゆうべ」の5分版。アニメと実際の映像で世界中の不思議な生きものたちをご紹介。今回はカリプテルス。.(n)

programme.title: マヌ〜ルのゆうべ ふしぎな生きもの大集合「ピラニア」[字]
programme.desc: 日曜夜の「ダーウィンが来た！」から生まれたミニアニメ「マヌ〜ルのゆうべ」の5分版。アニメと実際の映像で世界中の不思議な生きものたちをご紹介。今回はピラニア。.(n)

programme.title: ピタゴラスイッチ ミニミニ（11）
programme.desc: 考え方を育てる番組「ピタゴラスイッチ」。その1分版「ピタゴラスイッチミニミニ」をお届けします。.(n)

programme.title: ピタゴラスイッチ ミニミニ（12）
programme.desc: 考え方を育てる番組「ピタゴラスイッチ」。その1分版「ピタゴラスイッチミニミニ」をお届けします。.(n)

programme.title: センバツ 球児たちの行進曲「平成編」
programme.desc: 選抜高校野球を彩ってきた「時代を映す行進曲」をテーマに懐かしい映像や写真で紹介。.(n)

programme.title: みんなのうた「赤い自転車」「かいじん百面相」
programme.desc: 「赤い自転車」うた：花花／「かいじん百面相」うた：石丸幹二.(n)

programme.title: 先どり きょうの健康「病気のサイン！？味覚・嗅覚の異常“味が分からない”」[解][字]
programme.desc: 食べ物の味がわからなくなる、味が薄く感じるなどの症状が現れる味覚障害。亜鉛不足やかぜ、うつ病などさまざまな原因の可能性がある。新型コロナウイルス感染のことも。.(n)

programme.title: 日本の話芸 瀧川鯉昇 落語「へっつい幽霊」[解][字][再]
programme.desc: 瀧川鯉昇さんの落語「へっつい幽霊」をお送りします（令和3年2月19日（金）霞が関イイノホールで収録）.(n)

programme.title: 明日へ1min． みちのくモノがたり「目標は九百年前の和紙〜岩手 紙すき職人〜」
programme.desc: 東北のモノ作りを伝える「みちのくモノがたり」▽起源は平安時代！丈夫で優美な東山和紙▽七代目紙すき職人・鈴木英一の極意▽77歳の鈴木が目指す「最高峰の和紙」とは？.(n)

programme.title: Nスペ5min． 特別編「廃炉」[字]
programme.desc: 国が最長40年かかるとしている福島第一原発の廃炉。NHKが独自に記録し続けてきた映像をひもとき、原発事故から10年の軌跡と福島のこれからを見つめる。5分特別編。.(n)

programme.title: うまいッ！「生でも安心！脂が甘〜い！ 養殖サバ〜鳥取・岩美町〜」[字][再]
programme.desc: 鳥取県が誇る！陸上でお嬢様のように育てる！養殖サバ▽生でも安心！たっぷりの甘い脂▽イタリア家庭料理の定番！「インボルティーニ」▽チーズと合わせる「春巻き」も！.(n)

programme.title: NHK映像ファイル あの人に会いたい「高田賢三（ファッションデザイナー）」[字]
programme.desc: 去年10月に亡くなった高田賢三さん。1970年代からフランスで活躍。伝統やルールに縛られない斬新なデザインで、日本人デザイナーとして初めて世界的な成功を収めた。.(n)

programme.title: NHKニュース おはよう日本▼日米豪印が首脳会談
programme.desc: ▼新型コロナ 感染下げ止まらず宣言は？▼民宿“おかみ”ブログでつづる10年の思い▼「オオウナギ」衝撃の生態は▼インドネシア・被災地がつなぐ漁師のきずな.(n)

programme.title: NHKニュース おはよう日本▼日米豪印が首脳会談[字]
programme.desc: ▼新型コロナ 感染下げ止まらず 宣言は？最新情報▼気仙沼から中継・海藻や魚が…戻ってきた海の豊かさ▼大気不安定に 週末の天気は？.(n)

programme.title: NHKニュース おはよう日本（関東甲信越）[字]
programme.desc: ▽コロナ退散！小さな神社で祈る ▽亡き父へ ▽納豆食べきるヒトワザ 【キャスター】新井秀和，石橋亜紗ほか.(n)

programme.title: 【連続テレビ小説】おちょやん「第14週 兄弟喧嘩（げんか）」[字]
programme.desc: 連続テレビ小説「おちょやん」の土曜日版、「今週のおちょやん」。ドラマにも登場する黒衣（桂吉弥）の案内で、第14週目の泣き笑いハイライトをイッキ見する。.(n)

programme.title: チコちゃんに叱られる！▽鬼ってなに▽ジャンプのK点とは▽ハムスターの謎[字][再]
programme.desc: 今回も素朴な疑問がいっぱい。鬼ってなに？スキージャンプの「K点」ってなに？ハムスターがカラカラ走り続けるのはなぜ？わかりますか？ご家族でお楽しみください。.(n)

programme.title: 週刊まるわかりニュース[字]
programme.desc: 総合テレビとBS4Kの同時放送で1週間のニュースをランキングで紹介。高精細な4K映像で、注目ニュースを徹底取材。時事問題のコーナーでニュースのツボがわかります。.(n)

programme.title: 有吉のお金発見 突撃！カネオくん「意外と知らないクリーニングのお金の秘密」[字][再]
programme.desc: ふだん聞けないお金の秘密をカネオくんが可視化！意外と知らない「クリーニング」のお金の秘密を徹底調査！明日から使えるしみ抜きの極意。油よごれは〇〇で落とせる！.(n)

programme.title: ニュース・気象情報[字]
ネーミングバラエティー 日本人のおなまえっ！▽大久保＆赤木三陸鉄道謎解き旅[解][字][再]
programme.desc: おなまえナゾ解き旅、舞台は復興のシンボル岩手県三陸鉄道旅！「宮古」「釜石」オアシズ大久保佳代子と赤木アナが意外な由来をもつ駅名から魅力を再発見！絶品グルメも！.(n)

programme.title: みんなのうた「おおブレネリ」「山口さんちのツトム君」
programme.desc: 「おおブレネリ」うた：東京放送児童合唱団／「山口さんちのツトム君」うた：川橋啓史.(n)

programme.title: 首都圏情報 ネタドリ！「私を変えた3．11 東日本大震災から10年」[字][再]
programme.desc: 10年前の3．11を首都圏で経験した人の中には、あの日を境に人生を大きく変えた人たちがいます。医師を志した男性、山村に移住した女性。それぞれの10年の記録です。.(n)

programme.title: ドキュメント72時間「長崎・五島列島 さよならフェリー」[解][字][再]
programme.desc: 春、別れの季節。長崎県・五島列島の港で繰り返されてきた盛大な見送り。フェリーに乗り込み、新たな一歩を踏み出す人々の思いとは。※2019年に放送したものです。.(n)

programme.title: ニュース[字]
programme.desc: 【キャスター】佐藤誠太.(n)

programme.title: ニュース（関東・山梨・長野）[字]
バラエティー生活笑百科▽道路に張り出した枝 ほか【ゲスト】はいだしょうこ[字]
programme.desc: 今回は特別版として3人のサポート弁護士が登場。相談員の桂吉弥と山田花子、ゲストのはいだしょうことペアを組み、熱く討論。法律的な考え方をより分かりやすく紹介する。.(n)

programme.title: 花は咲く 2021
programme.desc: 震災から10年。「花は咲く」の新作を、作詞をした岩井俊二が監督。音楽は、もちろん作曲をした菅野よう子。新たな「花は咲く」が誕生した。その1分ダイジェスト版.(n)

programme.title: 新型コロナウイルス ♯あなたに知ってほしい「コロナ禍で睡眠に影響 対策は」[字]
【連続テレビ小説】おちょやん「第14週 兄弟喧嘩（げんか）」[字][再]
programme.desc: 連続テレビ小説「おちょやん」の土曜日版、「今週のおちょやん」。ドラマにも登場する黒衣（桂吉弥）の案内で、第14週目の泣き笑いハイライトをイッキ見する。.(n)

programme.title: 青天を衝（つ）け（4）「栄一、怒る」[解][字][デ][再]
programme.desc: 多額の御用金を求める代官・利根、その理不尽な態度に、栄一は怒る！慶喜は新たな家臣に平岡円四郎をむかえる。ペリー再来航で幕府は混乱、ついに日米和親条約を締結する….(n)

programme.title: 土曜スタジオパーク『おちょやん特集in大阪』▽ゲスト 杉咲花 成田凌[字]
programme.desc: 大阪からの公開生放送。2人の物語を振り返りながら、舞台裏をたっぷり伺います。また、星田英利さん、中村鴈治郎さんらが、2人の素顔を証言。さらに、上方喜劇の歴史も！.(n)

programme.title: 名曲アルバム「歌劇“魔笛”序曲」モーツァルト作曲
programme.desc: 「歌劇“魔笛”序曲」（管弦楽）東京フィルハーモニー交響楽団，（指揮）飯森範親 〜オーストリア・ウィーン〜.(n)

programme.title: キャラとおたまじゃくし島（9）「プリティな名前を言わないでぇ！ の巻」[字]
programme.desc: まっすぐで愛にあふれた少女戦士キャラが、不思議なガッキアニマルたちと出会い心を通わせる中で、音楽を奪われた島の謎を次々と解き明かす冒険ファンタジー第9話。.(n)

programme.title: 民謡魂 ふるさとの唄「埼玉県鴻巣市」[字]
programme.desc: ゲストはダチョウ倶楽部。メインコーナーでは、埼玉ゆかりの偉人にまつわるエピソードをコメディーで紹介する。そのほか埼玉の名曲もたっぷりとお届けする。.(n)

programme.title: せかほし5min．「世界のテーブルウエア」[字]
programme.desc: 「世界はほしいモノにあふれてる」選（え）りすぐりの旅を詰め込んだ、「せかほし5min．」。番組MCの鈴木亮平が、極上のショートトリップにご案内。.(n)

programme.title: Nスペ5min． 特別編「廃炉」[字]
programme.desc: 国が最長40年かかるとしている福島第一原発の廃炉。NHKが独自に記録し続けてきた映像をひもとき、原発事故から10年の軌跡と福島のこれからを見つめる。5分特別編。.(n)

programme.title: 証言記録スペシャル いつか来る日のために「“あなたを守る”体験者の言葉」[字]
programme.desc: 大災害に備えてこれだけは知っておいてほしい震災を経験した人が語る「命を守る為の教訓とは」▽当たり前に聞こえる言葉に秘められた極意▽YouTubeで話題！丸山礼.(n)

programme.title: しあわせ運べるように〜被災地をつなぐ心の歌〜[字]
programme.desc: 被災地ではさまざまな「心の歌」が人々を励まし、復興への道のりを支えてきた。みなさんの「復興ソング」とエピソードの数々を紹介。豪華アーティストのライブ演奏も！.(n)

programme.title: 50ボイス「東日本大震災10年の声」[字]
programme.desc: 東日本大震災から10年。過去に取材した被災地の方々を再取材。気仙沼と石巻の10年の声を届ける。街の変化、子どもたちの成長、意外な展開に司会の2人もビックリ！.(n)

programme.title: 東日本大震災 NHKスペシャル10年の記録
ニュース645（関東・山梨・長野）[字]
NHKニュース7[二][字]
programme.desc: 夜7時、「一歩先へ、一歩深く」 今、このニュースを届けたい 【キャスター】青井実，【サブキャスター】池田伸子，伊藤海彦，【気象キャスター】中村美公.(n)

programme.title: ありがとうを3．11に伝えよう委員会[字]
programme.desc: 東日本大震災で被災した人たちが、家族や友人、同僚、お世話になった方々に、これまで言えなかった“ありがとう”の思いを伝え、この10年間をねぎらいあう番組。.(n)

programme.title: ニュース・気象情報（関東甲信越）[字]
NHKスペシャル「大震災と子どもたちの10年 いま言葉にできること」[字]
programme.desc: 1800人に上る震災遺児。彼らはいま、身近な家族だからこそ語れぬ思いがあることを明かした。悲しみの温度差や期待への違和感、新しい家族への気遣い。10年間の記録。.(n)

programme.title: サタデースポーツ[字]
programme.desc: マラソン松田瑞生・失意の代表落選から1年・名古屋ウィメンズマラソンに挑む▽あす大相撲春場所初日！翠富士の肩すかし▽J1王者川崎・開幕5連勝なるか▽楽天田中将大.(n)

programme.title: LIFE！「東北SP 鈴木京香登場 東北に笑顔を届けたい！」[字]
programme.desc: 内村光良率いるオムニバスコント番組「LIFE！」。今夜は東北スペシャル！ゲストに鈴木京香登場。コントにトークに大盛り上がり。東北のみなさんに笑顔を届けたい！.(n)

programme.title: 3．11 10年 そしてこれから[字]
programme.desc: 震災から10年 3月11日に毎年のように曲を発表してきたRADWIMPS。これまで多くを語らなかった野田洋次郎が箭内道彦と対談 最後には「あいたい」を披露する.(n)

programme.title: 【よるドラ】ここは今から倫理です。 [終]（8）[解][字]
programme.desc: 新時代の“よるドラ”は全く新しい学園ドラマ。山田裕貴演じるミステリアスでクールな倫理教師が悩める高校生の問題に立ち向かう。「この『倫理』は人生の必修科目です！」.(n)

programme.title: 今夜も生でさだまさし スペシャル「〜まだまだ皆でがんばらんば！〜」
programme.desc: 東日本大震災から10年、今も復興に向けて頑張る全国の皆さんにエールを送るため、宮城県気仙沼市民会館と東京NHK101スタジオから豪華ゲストと共に拡大版でお届け！.(n)

programme.title: ダーウィンが来た！10min．「南米の獣人！？ 幻のクマに遭遇」[字]
programme.desc: 2本足で立ち、全身毛むくじゃら。南米の村で“獣人”と恐れられてきた伝説の生物に遭遇。巨体で大ジャンプしたり、断崖絶壁で子育てしたり。正体は謎だらけのクマだった！.(n)

programme.title: 音紀行「潮騒がはこぶ干潟の春〜東京湾・三番瀬」
名曲アルバム「幻想交響曲〜第1楽章〜」ベルリオーズ作曲／ニウナオミ・編曲
programme.desc: 「幻想交響曲〜第1楽章〜」（管弦楽）東京フィルハーモニー交響楽団，（指揮）飯森範親 〜フランス ラ・コート・サンタンドレ〜.(n)

programme.title: みんなのうた「ユミちゃんの引越し」「おもいでのアルバム」

programme.title: イッピン・選「スマートで丈夫！暮らし彩る縞（しま）模様〜福岡 小倉織〜」[字]

programme.title: 花は咲く「イル・ディーヴォ“花は咲く”を歌う」

programme.title: 目撃！にっぽん「あなたの生きた町で〜大槌町職員と遺族の10年〜」[字]
programme.desc: 岩手県大槌町では、津波の犠牲となった39人の役場職員の最後を調べる取り組みが続いている。残された職員と遺族、大切な人を思い歩んできた10年を見つめる。.(n)

programme.title: Nスペ5min． 特別編「廃炉」[字]

programme.desc: 宮城県と山形県の県境に位置する蔵王連峰。秋、山腹の森では鳥たちが冬に備えて活発に動き回る。やがて訪れる厳しい冬。数え切れないほどの樹氷が山肌を埋め尽くす。.(n)

programme.title: サラメシ シーズン10（33）[解][字][再]

programme.title: サンドのお風呂いただきます「秩父編」[字][再]
programme.desc: 秩父で人気の元力士が営む温泉旅館へ！力士時代の貴重な品と絶品ちゃんこ鍋を堪能。稀勢の里も入った巨大釜風呂に舞の海さんが入浴し、下積み時代の夫婦の愛情秘話に感動。.(n)

programme.title: ニッポンの里山 ふるさとの絶景に出会う旅▽北限のブナと暮らす里 北海道黒松内町[字]
programme.desc: 町のほぼ真ん中にブナの自然林を守り、周辺の広葉樹の森を計画的に切りながら森と共存する美しい町・黒松内。森の水が注ぐ清流・朱太川には天然アユが遡上してくる。.(n)

programme.title: ごちそんぐDJ「ぎゅうぎゅうバゲット」

programme.title: 知りたガールと学ボーイ「名前を聞きたい！」

programme.desc: 東日本大震災で亡くなった人のうち、高齢者は半数を超え、障害者の死亡率は全住民平均の2倍だった。避難が困難な“要支援者”の命をどうすれば守れるのか。課題を探る。.(n)

programme.desc: 今、新型コロナ感染の不安から不眠に悩む人が増えている。「寝つけない」「何度も目が覚める」など高齢者に多い睡眠障害の原因とその対策をタイプ別にお伝えする。.(n)

programme.title: 視点・論点「東日本大震災10年 サードセクターの社会的役割とは」[字]
programme.desc: 「東日本大震災10年 サードセクターの社会的役割とは」菅野 拓（京都経済短期大学 講師）.(n)

programme.title: NHK高校講座 科学と人間生活「光を求めている植物」[字]
programme.desc: 科学技術の発展は、どのようなところに生かされているのだろう？ 私たちの身の回りにある自然や道具を糸口に、科学の世界を楽しく解き明かしていく。.(n)

programme.title: NHK高校講座 総合的な探究の時間「あなたが身のまわりの環境を マッキー」[字]
programme.desc: 「総合的な探究の時間」とはいかなる学習か？を、番組独自の学習モデル、学習ノウハウと、現役高校生の探究学習の実践を通して学べるNHK高校講座です。.(n)

programme.title: NHK高校講座 日本史「下剋上の社会と戦国大名」[字]
programme.desc: 「歴カフェ」へようこそ！ここは歴史好きな人たちが集い各時代について語り合う茶屋です。日本はどんな歴史を歩んできたのか。日本史について知る楽しさを、さぁご一緒に！.(n)

programme.title: 日本の話芸 落語 桂文福「お笑い演芸教室」[解][字][再]
programme.desc: 第412回NHK上方落語の会から桂文福さんの口演で落語「お笑い演芸教室」をお送りします（2021年2月4日（木）NHK大阪ホールで収録）。.(n)

programme.title: そして「みんなのうた」は生まれた〜60年を彩った名曲秘話▽おお牧場はみどりほか[字]

programme.title: プチプチ・アニメ リヴ＆ベル「ベルくんのほそくてながいお友達」

programme.title: ピタゴラスイッチ「“すきま やくにたってます”のまき」[字]

programme.title: みんなのうた「ぐーぐーちょきちょき」「愛を着て」
programme.desc: 「ぐーぐーちょきちょき」うた：岡村靖幸／「愛を着て」うた：コレサワ.(n)

programme.title: おかあさんといっしょ 月曜日[字]

programme.title: みいつけた！ 月曜日[字]

programme.title: にほんごであそぼ「福島のおきあがりこぼし」[字][デ]
programme.desc: 今日は、あいだのじいさんが「福島のいいところ」をご紹介します。野村萬斎「七転び…」、花鹿亭「時そば」より、名文／寿限無、春はあけぼの、うた「日本全国むかし歩き」.(n)

programme.title: えいごであそぼ with Orton「“sing”であそぼ」[デ]

programme.title: ミニアニメ おちゃめなシモン「しくじり君はだれ？」

programme.title: アニメ はなかっぱ「美男の実」「バラの女王と黒バラの騎士」[字][デ]
programme.desc: 頭の上に花が咲くかっぱ「はなかっぱ」と個性豊かな仲間たち、そして謎の花「わか蘭」を狙う黒羽屋蝶兵衛一味が、緑いっぱいの「やまびこ村」で、てんやわんやの大騒ぎ！.(n)

programme.title: ミミクリーズ「うごきのふしぎ むれ」[解][字]

programme.title: オトッペ「ヤングウエスティ （出会い）」

programme.title: アニメ わしも「ハチローの来世占い」[字]

programme.title: アニメ 忍たま乱太郎「抜天坊の破産の段」[字]

programme.title: 世界10代コロナ会議（3）※字幕スーパー

programme.title: まいにちスクスク 災害時に役立つ防災メニュー（1）▽食品の備蓄とアレンジレシピ[字]

programme.title: ハートネットTV「10年話せなかったこと」[字]

programme.title: きょうの健康 病気のサイン！？味覚・嗅覚の異常「味が分からない」[解][字]

programme.title: NHK手話ニュース845[手]

programme.title: きょうの料理 手仕事12か月「つくだ煮」[字]

programme.title: きょうの料理ビギナーズ「しっとりおいしく そぼろ弁当」[字]

programme.title: 趣味どきっ！ 茶の湯 武者小路千家（3）「茶の湯で春をもっと楽しむ〜濃茶」[解][字]
programme.desc: 武者小路千家の「茶の湯」を学ぶシリーズ。春の京都を舞台に茶の湯の世界を楽しむ。第3回は客作法と春ならではの旅箪笥と釣釜を用いた濃茶点前でのもてなしを学ぶ。.(n)

programme.title: まる得マガジン 不器用さんでも大丈夫！はじめてのミシン（1）「準備と試し縫い」[字]

programme.title: アニメ SHIROBAKO（22）「ノアは下着です。」[字]

programme.title: NHKプラスで趣味が広がる EテレパワーUP作戦[字]

programme.title: WOWOWオリジナルドラマ アフロ田中 #8
programme.desc: のりつけ雅春による人気コミックシリーズ『アフロ田中』を、今やコメディドラマには欠かせない存在となった賀来賢人の主演で連続ドラマ化！.(n)

programme.title: WOWOWオリジナルドラマ ぴぷる〜AIと結婚生活はじめました〜 #6
programme.desc: 声優・梶裕貴が実写連続ドラマ初主演。原田まりる著『ぴぷる』を原作とし、新しい愛(AI)のカタチを問う、SFヒューマンコメディ。.(n)

programme.title: ブレッド＆バター 50周年スペシャルコンサート〜あの頃のまま〜
programme.desc: 1969年9月にデビューした岩沢幸矢・二弓の兄弟デュオ、ブレッド＆バター。エバーグリーンな音楽を奏でる彼らの50年の集大成となるコンサート！.(n)

programme.title: あずみ
programme.desc: 上戸彩が本格主演を務めたアクション時代劇。最強の刺客となるべく育てられた少女あずみ。理も義もなくただ命令のまま、人を斬る自分の宿命に疑問を抱く彼女だったが……。.(n)

programme.title: あずみ２ Death or Love
programme.desc: 上戸彩が引き続いて主演し、暗殺者としての人生に苦しむヒロイン役を熱演。関ヶ原後の混乱期、最強の刺客として育てられた少女の苦闘を描いた痛快アクション時代劇の続編。.(n)

programme.title: 【3時間スペシャル】Augusta Camp 2020
programme.desc: オフィスオーガスタのアーティストが一堂に会する＜Augusta Camp＞。2020年9月26日・27日にオンライン開催されたイベントの模様を3時間に渡り放送。.(n)

programme.title: ヌードの夜／愛は惜しみなく奪う
programme.desc: 自らの過去を消し去るために犯罪に手を染める少女と、彼女から奇妙な依頼を受けたことで壮絶なトラブルに巻き込まれる中年男の愛憎を描いたエロティック・ノワール。.(n)

programme.title: テニスグランドスラム名勝負選全米2019女子決勝アンドレスクvsS・ウィリアムズ
programme.desc: セレナ・ウイリアムズは5年ぶりの全米制覇、四大大会優勝史上最多タイ記録を狙う。対する19歳の新鋭ビアンカ・アンドレスクは全米本戦初出場で初優勝の快挙を目指す。.(n)

programme.title: 巴里祭 [4Kデジタル・リマスター版] 【没後40年 ルネ・クレール】
programme.desc: 『リラの門』の名匠ルネ・クレール監督が、フランスの革命記念日の前日、花を売る若い女性とタクシー運転手が繰り広げる恋のいざこざを、ほほえましいタッチで描いた喜劇。.(n)

programme.title: In The Night Garden
programme.desc: In the Night Garden is about a magical picture-book place that exists between waking and sleeping in a child's imagination. Reached by following a magical little blue star, the Night Garden is a warm and affectionate world which is home to a comical and diverse community of toys, living happily together, and who care for each other unconditionally. In the Night Garden is a thoroughly modern interpretation of a nursery rhyme picture book, and takes children on an imaginative journey to meet a host of wonderfully silly characters living together within a happy and caring community. It is both funny and reassuring, with a capacity to relax and entertain. The tone of the program is deliberately literary. Words, rhymes and music carry the viewer through a happy world of loveable characters and nursery rhyme nonsense. Filmed in real woodland, the setting is breathtaking and the program weaves together the very latest technical innovations in live-character costume technology and computer animation, to create a compelling and fully immersing experience for young viewers.(n)

programme.desc: Three iconic islands. Contained ecosystems, cut off from the mainland. For their wildlife and human castaways, islands seem like sanctuaries. But there's a price to pay for living in paradise. Four in five of all global extinctions have happened on islands. In a rapidly changing world, they reflect the health of the planet. programme.title: In The Night Garden
programme.desc: In the Night Garden is about a magical picture-book place that exists between waking and sleeping in a child's imagination. Reached by following a magical little blue star, the Night Garden is a warm and affectionate world which is home to a comical and diverse community of toys, living happily together, and who care for each other unconditionally. In the Night Garden is a thoroughly modern interpretation of a nursery rhyme picture book, and takes children on an imaginative journey to meet a host of wonderfully silly characters living together within a happy and caring community. It is both funny and reassuring, with a capacity to relax and entertain. The tone of the program is deliberately literary. Words, rhymes and music carry the viewer through a happy world of loveable characters and nursery rhyme nonsense. Filmed in real woodland, the setting is breathtaking and the program weaves together the very latest technical innovations in live-character costume technology and computer animation, to create a compelling and fully immersing experience for young viewers.(n)

programme.title: Earth's Tropical Islands
programme.desc: Three iconic islands. Contained ecosystems, cut off from the mainland. For their wildlife and human castaways, islands seem like sanctuaries. But there's a price to pay for living in paradise. Four in five of all global extinctions have happened on islands. In a rapidly changing world, they reflect the health of the planet. Islands explores the wildlife, history and culture of these unique habitats. This episode is about Madagascar, Earth's oldest island, cast away from Africa and India 80 million years ago. This land of plenty shows what strange forms life can take when it's left to experiment.(n)

Complicating matters is the fact that an atmospheric approach will be impossible, which forces Scott and Virgil to configure SKI PODS to get there in time. Scott admits the burden he feels as leader but the crisis is averted with Max's help.(n)

programme.title: TV One Life
programme.desc: Young people listening to loud music, performing unusual stunts, and surprising members of the public in hidden camera situations may sound like something you might find on MTV. But, it's not. TV One Life is "Young people doing young people stuff," says Sean Park, Pastor of the Raleigh Charisma Church who produce the show. Each weekly episode focuses on a challenge, and aims to reach out to young people with the message of Jesus Christ and his love and salvation. The program shows that being a Christian is fun and that Jesus can fill your life with joy. It's not something boring or dull : it's cool and giving your life to Jesus is the best decision you could ever make.(n)

programme.title: Love's Christmas Journey Pt. 2
programme.desc: The saga of Love Comes Softly continues in this 2 part mini-series holiday event. After her brother Aaron leaves home to stake a mining claim, Ellie heads West to care for his children. However, her holiday spirit is tested when she hears news that Aaron has gone missing and her nephew must embark by horseback to find him during a brutal winter storm. It is a journey that will yield unexpected surprises and challenges for everyone. Through love, faith, and forgiveness, a heartening family reunion will become a very real Christmas miracle.(n)

programme.title: Hour of Power
programme.desc: Since 1970 the Hour of Power has been reaching viewers from around the world. Originally founded by Dr Robert H Schuller, the program became the most-watched religious program in the world, reaching 17 million viewers. Now under the leadership of Bobby Schuller, Dr Schuller's grandson. The congregation worships at Shepherd's Grove Church in Garden Grove, CA. The program aims to provide spiritual principles and practices that can help people, as they become happy students of Jesus and live a life of meaning. To learn more about who they are in Christ through the process of formation, to belong to his family of believers and become a part of the community and to heal as they are loved and then love and help heal others through mission. Jesus Christ ushered in the Kingdom of God into our world through His death and resurrection. He invites everyone to be a part of this amazing movement by trusting and following Him. There is no fuller, richer life than the one that is lived in Christ.(n)

programme.title: Snowmen
programme.desc: Snowmen is a humorous and heartfelt coming-of-age story about three unlikely heroes and the winter that changed their lives forever. After a surprising discovery in the snow catapults three small-town boys into the spotlight, the best friends hatch a plan to be remembered forever by setting a Guinness World Records title. Along the way, the trio battles schoolyard bullies, unites their community and discovers that while fame may be fleeting, true friendship lasts forever. The film stars Bobby Coleman, Ray Liotta, Bobb'e J Thompson, Josh Flitter and Christopher Lloyd.(n)

programme.title: The Good Road
programme.sub-title: Kenya: Big Life In The Wild
programme.desc: The Good Road offers a compelling look at the messy and complicated business of global charity. Hosts Earl Bridges and Craig Martin - longtime philanthropy veterans, globe-trotters, and best friends - set off around the world to places where people are doing good. Sometimes that good is several plane rides away and sometimes just off your own daily commute. Border camps for refugees, 3rd world Neonatal Intensive Care Units and fully armed anti-poaching teams with Land Rovers are only some of the impossible situations they explore in Season One.(n)

programme.title: Billy Graham Classics
programme.desc: The best-known Christian evangelist of the 20th century, Billy Graham gained world attention in 1949 with a tent revival in downtown Los Angeles that was scheduled for three weeks and lasted six. In the ensuing 55 years and more, 'Billy Graham Crusades' consistently drew audiences of thousands to arenas and stadiums throughout the world.'Classic Crusades' presents the best of the last 35 years of Billy Graham that brought the message of salvation through Jesus Christ to the world. World renowned actors, singers, athletes and ministers share the platform with Dr. Graham. Also often features the famous sounds of the Billy Graham Choir, George Beverly Shea and Cliff Barrows for an hour of blessing and inspiration to all who watch.(n)

programme.title: PowerPoint with Dr. Jack Graham
programme.desc: PowerPoint Ministries started as a vision of Dr Jack Graham and his wife, Deb, 20 years ago. They believed that the power of God was evident in their growing church and that His Gospel message should be spread beyond the walls of that church to the world at large. They put their faith into action and purchased airtime on the Trinity Broadcasting Network. PowerPoint Ministries was then officially launched in April 1994. Over the past 19 years, PowerPoint Ministries has grown to an expansive network of local, national, and international television and radio broadcasts. In fact, PowerPoint can be seen or heard by a potential audience of millions of television viewers and radio listeners across the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, South Africa, Iran, Russia, Israel and more. The Ministry has a vision to glorify God by introducing Jesus Christ as Lord to as many people as possible and to develop them in Christian living using the most effective means to impact the world, making an eternal difference in this generation.(n)

programme.title: The Blessed Life with Robert Morris
programme.desc: Gateway Church is a multicampus, nondenominational church in the Dallas/Fort Worth Metroplex led by Pastor Robert Morris. Since it began in 2000, the church has grown to more than 39,000 active members and six local campuses. Its vision is to see people saved, healed, set free, discipled, equipped, empowered, and serving. Its mission is to help each person at Gateway believe in Jesus, belong to family, become a follower, and build God's kingdom.(n)

programme.title: Ask Chris
programme.desc: A Kiwi-made show tackling the tough issues that many of us deal with, yet are afraid or unable to take to the counsellor's office ourselves. Ask Chris deals with a variety of topics such as communication breakdown, relationship problems, phobias and addictions, dealing with negative emotion in a constructive way and other issues from work-place bullying to the baby-blues. Chris Hight has 20 years experience as a counsellor, and 5 years experience as an online counsellor. Chris Hight pioneered web-based counselling in New Zealand, offering the very first online service in this country. Her website askchris.co.nz has grown to become a valuable resource in the New Zealand counselling sphere.(n)

programme.title: Jovis Bon Hovis & the Creation Crew
programme.desc: Jovis Bon-Hovis and the Creation Crew is a fun, vibrant and exciting show full of comedy, drama and colour.(n)

programme.title: TV One Life
programme.desc: Young people listening to loud music, performing unusual stunts, and surprising members of the public in hidden camera situations may sound like something you might find on MTV. But, it's not. TV One Life is "Young people doing young people stuff," says Sean Park, Pastor of the Raleigh Charisma Church who produce the show. Each weekly episode focuses on a challenge, and aims to reach out to young people with the message of Jesus Christ and his love and salvation. The program shows that being a Christian is fun and that Jesus can fill your life with joy. It's not something boring or dull : it's cool and giving your life to Jesus is the best decision you could ever make.(n)

programme.title: Brian Houston @ Hillsong TV
programme.desc: Teaching from Pastor Brian Houston filmed in Sydney Australia's Hillsong Church weekend services featuring worship led by Joel Houston, Darlene Zschech and the Hillsong worship team Australia.(n)

programme.title: Hope Centre with Wayne Alcorn
programme.desc: Wayne Alcorn is the Senior Pastor of Hope Centre International. His practical teaching will encourage and challenge you to grow in faith and relationship with God.(n)

programme.title: Jeni: Seeking the Extraordinary
programme.desc: Jeni: Seeking the Extraordinary is a reality TV series that documents the journey of Jeni and Sarah as they travel the USA from Michigan to Florida. They sample some great food, visit well known sites, and experience fun activities such as white water rafting and indoor skydiving. Most importantly, they meet a host of extraordinary women, young and old, and talk about identity, purpose, relationships, beauty, choices, and much more. Throughout their travels, Jeni and Sarah will have fun, but they will always bring each episode back to one central theme: teaching young ladies about God's grace in their lives and addressing relevant issues in a redemptive way. Jeni: Seeking the Extraordinary is different than other youth-oriented reality TV for many reasons and will stand out as a positive, biblically-based alternative to many of the secular reality shows that depict today's youth in a negative light. It offers another option for reality TV fans that love the genre but are turned of.(n)

programme.title: Love's Unending Legacy
programme.desc: The widowed Missie LeHaye and her young son, Maddie, move back east to be closer to her parents and begin again her career as a schoolteacher.(n)

programme.title: The Ties That Bind
programme.desc: "Ties that Bind" revolves around Allison McLean (Kelli Williams), a tough and experienced police detective, mother and wife in suburban Seattle. When she and her police partner (Dion Johnstone) must arrest her brother (Luke Perry) for aggravated assault, her world drastically changes as he's convicted and sent to prison, leaving his two teenagers teetering on the brink of foster care. Ultimately, she takes them into her home, ending up with four teenagers to raise as well as her demanding job solving local crimes.(n)

programme.title: The Find: India
programme.desc: A young couple and their two children embark on a worldwide search for compelling stories, risk-taking individuals, and life-changing projects. In Season One, The Hansows travel to India to spend time with The Murrays, an incredible family changing their community.(n)

programme.title: New Horizons
programme.desc: New Horizons is a teaching series from Gymea Baptist Church, Sydney, presented by Rev Dr Marc Rader. Gymea Baptist is a contemporary evangelical church in Sydney's South. Companion study guides for the series are available on line at: www.gymeabaptist.org.au/newhorizons.(n)

programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed they are by their heavenly Father.(n)

programme.title: The Leon Show
programme.desc: Leon Fontaine hosts this Spirit Contemporary daily talk show that explores relevant topics with world-renowned guests such as Franklin Graham, Roma Downey, Max Lucado, Lee Strobel, Darlene Zschech and many more. programme.desc: Wu-Tang Clan mastermind RZA recounts how his life journey and hip-hop career have been shaped by the Kung fu films he loves.(n)

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: On this first leg he learns to set table aboard the luxury liner Queen Elizabeth before she sets sail and discovers how Cunard steamers began by transporting post across the Atlantic. Michael then heads to Netley, where he discovers the remains of an extensive military hospital built by order of Queen Victoria and from there to Basingstoke, where he finds out about a pitched battle between townspeople and the Salvation Army.(n)

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey from the Hampshire coast to the West Midlands in a distinctly military vein. At Winchfield, he discovers the vast carriage which carried the Duke of Wellington's coffin to his state funeral at St Paul's Cathedral in 1852 and hears how the Duke's chestnut stallion also received full military honours when he was buried at the Duke's seat, Stratfield Saye. Michael then heads for Farnborough and the army camp at Aldershot, where, after the Crimean War, greater physical fitness among rank and file Victorian soldiers became a priority. Private Portillo joins the regulars to be put through his paces under military instruction. Sanctuary is not far away in Farnborough North at the Benedictine Monastery of St Michael, where Michael visits the tomb of the French Emperor Napoleon III and his family. He ends today's leg of his journey in Crowthorne, where in the year his Bradshaw's was published, there opened a notorious new institution: England's first Asylum for the Criminally Insane, Broadmoor.(n)

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Today's leg begins in Wokingham, where Bradshaw's reports the proprietor of The Times newspaper resided and where he was a great benefactor. Michael finds out how demand from a growing number of rail commuters fuelled the development of the modern printing press and learns how to print on an iron press. He then heads to Newbury, where he encounters a Tudor captain of industry, who manufactured cloth in enormous volumes. Michael's next destination is Trowbridge, where Sir Isaac Pitman invented his famous shorthand. He ends today's journey in Bradford on Avon, where he hears from a local manufacturer how his Victorian forebears were the first in Britain to be licensed to vulcanise rubber. They supplied springs, buffers and hoses for the locomotive industry and now make rubber suspensions systems for bicycles.(n)

programme.title: Destination Flavour - Japan
programme.desc: On this part of his food lovers' tour of Japan, Adam Liaw rides gondolas, trams and a cafe racer through Kyushu and Shikoku. He meets up with a group of Grannies who used iPads and foliage to save their tiny mountain township and a farmer who feeds his pigs with organic fruit in order to produce the world's best bacon. Inspired by Japan's southern food heroes, Adam cooks some incredible dishes, including the famed castella cake and twice-braised Kakuni pork belly.(n)

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade wants to make travelling more fun, more efficient, and less tedious. In this four-part series, he shows us how to have the most culturally efficient holiday possible...with all the boring bits taken out. programme.title: The World's Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In this episode is a luxurious 800km African train safari, where we'll be travelling on Rovos Rail's vintage hotel train. Lovingly rebuilt by the Rovos family to the highest of specifications, this beautiful 14-carriage train leaves Pretoria for its three-day journey to Durban on the coast. Travelling only at a leisurely speed of 40km/h, this once-in-a-lifetime trip is not about speed, but about luxury train travel and exceptional service.(n)

programme.desc: Graham Chapman, John Cleese. Monty Python goes Biblical in this sacrilegious send-up of the life of a would-be Messiah.(n)

programme.title: The Vice Guide To Film
programme.desc: Intimate interviews with top trans filmmakers examines the problematic history of transgender representation, diving into today's most daring, hilarious, and heartfelt trans films.(n)

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey from Southampton to Wolverhampton beginning today in Chippenham, where at Lacock Abbey he discovers how the world's first photographic negative was made and learns how to make a print. He travels on to Bristol to visit the Victorian Clifton Zoo, where he finds tigers and polar bears before him also arrived by train. Next stop is Severn Tunnel Junction in Wales, where he explores an extraordinary piece of Victorian engineering with its own pump house pumping out millions of gallons a day to keep it dry. Michael then heads for Gloucester to find out why the station became infamous for lost luggage. At the city's cathedral, Michael meets a stonemason who bravely invites him to chip away.(n)

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: On the final leg of his journey from Southampton to Wolverhampton, Michael Portillo's first destination is the elegant spa town of Cheltenham, where he discovers a very early locomotive carriage which ran not on rails but on the road and is lucky enough to get behind the wheel. His next stop is the medieval town of Tewkesbury, scene of a grisly battle during the Wars of the Roses. Armour-plated and sword at the ready, Michael joins a group of re-enactors for a taste of the action. Mercifully unscathed, he makes tracks for Droitwich to find out about how a lowly boatman became the King of Salt and lived in a beautiful chateau, an unexpected sight in the Midlands countryside. Michael's journey ends in Wolverhampton, where he hears Queen Victoria made an emotional visit, which signalled the end of her exile from public life after mourning her husband, Prince Albert. He learns how the townspeople showed off their talents to the Queen, among them the lost art of Japanning, a speciality of Wolverhampton.(n)

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Guided by his 19th century Bradshaw's guide, Michael Portillo embarks on a new journey from Norwich to Chichester. On this first leg he explores Norwich's medieval heart. In the city's Norman castle he uncovers the Victorian public's gory fascination with crime and punishment and finds out how campaigners such as Elizabeth Fry, who was born in Norwich, worked to improve conditions for prisoners. At the city's livestock market, Michael learns how to buy a calf at auction with a subtle twitch of his guidebook before heading west to Thetford to explore the rabbit warrens of the Brecks. He discovers how the Victorian appetite for rabbits and their fur led to special train services to London, known as Bunny Trains. After a painful encounter with a polecat, Michael heads northwest to Brandon, home of some of the best quality flint in Britain and tries his hand at flint-knapping.(n)

programme.title: Meat: A Threat To Our Planet?
programme.desc: In this ground-breaking film, animal biologist and meat-eater Liz Bonnin embarks on one of the toughest investigations of her career. Taking her from cattle farms in the decimated Amazon rainforests, to Dutch research labs growing in-vitro meat, Liz discovers the stark and sometimes stomach-churning reality of the meat industry.(n)

programme.desc: Vigilante paedophile hunters are posing online as underage girls, but will this help police catch potential offenders or help them escape justice.(n)

programme.title: Michael Mosley: A History Of Surgery
programme.desc: Looks at plastic surgery discovering it is not a modern phenomenon. It started over 400 years ago with a spate of botched nose jobs, so badly engineered that the nose would fall off if the wind blew too hard. It marked the birth of a whole new obsession - surgeons gradually became entranced with the idea that not only could they fix the body, but now they could even fix our sense of self-esteem.(n)

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey from the East Coast to the South Coast beginning today in the port of Ipswich, capital of the farming county of Suffolk. His first port of call is an agricultural implement works with its own railway sidings. Michael investigates what could have earned the Victorian manufacturer a special mention in his Bradshaw's. Continuing his journey south west into Essex Michael dredges oysters off Mersea Island before taking the train to Witham, where he discovers a model farming establishment at Tiptree. His final destination today is Chelmsford and the world's first purpose-built radio equipment factory, established by Guglielmo Marconi.(n)

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Steered by his Bradshaw's, Michael Portillo heads along the Essex bank of the Thames before crossing the river into the Garden of England, Kent. He begins today's leg at Barkingside, where a Victorian philanthropist called Dr Thomas Barnardo made it his life's work to transform the lives of destitute children. From Upminster Michael takes the London, Tilbury and Southend Railway to Tilbury and finds out how the line and the old station transformed the town into one of the country's most important ports. At the docks, Michael tries his hand at loading a container on to a pocket wagon. Over the river at Gravesend Michael discovers how one of Queen Victoria's favourite army officers, General Gordon, left his mark on the town. Michael's last destination on today's leg is Rochester, where he encounters a host of familiar characters and explores the city which was home to one of the Victorian era's greatest writers, Charles Dickens.(n)

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey from Norwich to Chichester beginning today in Faversham in Kent, at one of the country's oldest surviving breweries, Shepherd Neame. Michael discovers how the brewery invested heavily in the railways and even ran rolling stock with its own smart livery taking beer to London. After making his own delivery to the Railway Tavern in one of the brewery's oldest vehicles, Michael heads for the south coast to the defensive town of Dover, little more than 25 miles from the historic enemy, the French. Here he uncovers one of Dover's best kept secrets, the sunken fortress known as the Western Heights. In the Weald of Kent, Michael finds out how the railways helped to put Tonbridge School on track for cricketing glory before heading into Surrey where he blow-dries a hen in Dorking.(n)

programme.title: Elizabeth I And Her Enemies
programme.desc: Born in 1533 to King Henry VIII and Anne Boleyn, Elizabeth was declared illegitimate when her mother was beheaded. Restored to the line of succession with the help of Henry's final wife, Catherine Parr, Elizabeth spent years thwarting the attentions of Catherine's new husband, Thomas Seymour. Later, Elizabeth's sister, Queen Mary, accused Elizabeth of treason in a plot to take the throne.(n)

programme.title: Great Indian Railway Journeys
programme.desc: On an epic railway journey from Lucknow in Uttar Pradesh to Kolkata in West Bengal, Michael Portillo uses his Bradshaw's 1913 Handbook of Indian, Foreign and Colonial Travel, published when the British Raj was fifty-five years old, to chart a course through India's history from the days of The East India Company to the dawn of independence.(n)

programme.desc: Rob Bell explores the rugged east coast of Scotland to discover how the Bell Rock lighthouse earned its reputation as a wonder of the industrial world. programme.title: 24 Hours In Emergency

programme.desc: Up-to-date reports and analysis of the major national and international news stories of the day in Australia's only world news service. (An SBS Production).(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Roger leads Jamie's militia to the rural trading post of Brownsville and finds himself embroiled in a bitter feud.(n)

programme.title: Berlin Station
programme.sub-title: Eye Fears When It Is Done To See, The
programme.desc: B.B. and Valerie attempt to amass support for an intervention. April's assets face deportation. A dangerous figure invites Hector and Torres into dangerous territory.(n)

programme.title: The Chef
programme.desc: A veteran chef faces off against his restaurant group's new CEO, who wants to the establishment to lose a star from its rating in order to bring in a younger chef who specializes in molecular gastronomy.(n)

programme.title: White Tiger
programme.desc: Great Patriotic War, early 1940s. After barely surviving a battle with a mysterious, ghostly white Tiger tank, Red Army Sergeant Ivan Naydenov becomes obsessed with its destruction.(n)

programme.title: Eagle Has Landed
programme.desc: The story of the dramatic recovery of three of Britain's most spectacular birds - the sea eagle, the osprey and the red kite. In the run up to the First World War, all three birds were in rapid decline: only five pairs of red kites survived in the whole country. Ospreys and sea eagles actually became extinct in Britain in 1916. Since then a 50-year struggle against the odds has led to ospreys breeding in England in 2001, red kites thriving a few miles from London (for the first time in 150 years) and healthy population of sea eagles breeding on the West Coast of Scotland.(n)

programme.title: The Importance of Being Earnest
programme.desc: Two gentlemen in 1890s England use the same pseudonym, Ernest, on the sly. However, they both fall in love with women using that name, leading to a comedy of mistaken identities.(n)

programme.title: The Tale Of Despereaux
programme.desc: Based on Kate DiCamillo's much-loved book, "The Tale of Despereaux," is a fable about a tiny, brave mouse graced with oversized ears who follows his senses into territories uncharted by his kind. Born with an enthusiasm too big for his little mouse world, Despereaux Tilling befriends a banished rat, falls in love with a lonely princess and rescues the Kingdom of Dor from the tyranny of darkness and grief. Matthew Broderick is the voice of Despereaux supported by Dustin Hoffman as Roscuro, Emma Watson, Tracey Ullman, Sigourney Weaver, Kevin Kline and William H. Macy.(n)

programme.title: Hotel Salvation
programme.desc: Rajiv is forced to drop everything in order to accommodate his father's last and bizarre wish to travel to Varanasi to attain salvation. The trip that follows forces the duo to re-engage with each other and the world around them in this heart-warming comedy.(n)

programme.title: Forever Enthralled
programme.desc: A biographical account of Mei Lanfang, China's greatest opera star.(n)

programme.title: The Red Turtle
programme.desc: Gorgeously animated, this wordless story about a stranded castaway pays tribute to what's most important in life: companionship, love, family, and the stewardship of nature.(n)

programme.title: Roald Dahl's Esio Trot
programme.desc: Esio Trot is a story about shy Mr Hoppy and his secret love for his neighbour, Mrs Silver, who he chats to over the balcony. This was one of Roald Dahl's last stories.(n)

programme.title: Swallows and Amazons
programme.desc: Delightful family viewing telling the story of two groups of children holidaying in England's beautiful Lake District in 1929. Their friendly rivalry and exciting exploits add adventure and colour to the tale.(n)

programme.title: Boys Don't Cry
programme.desc: A true story about an extraordinary double life, a complicated love story and a crime that shattered the heartland. Brandon Teena is the popular new guy in a tiny Nebraska town. He hangs out with the guys, drinking, cussing, and bumper surfing. He also charms the young women, who've never met a more sensitive and considerate young man. Life is good for Brandon.(n)

programme.title: IP Man 3
programme.desc: When a band of brutal gangsters led by a crooked property developer (Mike Tyson) make a play to take over the city, Master Ip is forced to take a stand. Fists will fly as some of the most incredible fight scenes ever filmed play out on the big screen in this soon-to-be genre classic.(n)

programme.title: 50 is the new 30
programme.desc: Dumped by her husband and downsized out of her job, Marie-Francine has to move back in with her parents - at the age of 50. They treat her like a child, but it is in the small e-cigarette shop they open for her that she finds love with Miguel, a chef who doesn't admit to her that he is in the same situation. It's not easy having a young heart in a middle-age body, but Marie-Francine proves to us that 50 is the new 30.(n)

programme.title: Aloys
programme.desc: A lonely private investigator is contacted by a mysterious woman who pulls him into a mind game known as 'telephone walking'. Fascinated by her voice, Aloys discovers an imaginary universe that allows him to break out of his isolation.(n)

programme.desc: A veteran chef faces off against his restaurant group's new CEO, who wants to the establishment to lose a star from its rating in order to bring in a younger chef who specializes in molecular gastronomy.(n)

programme.title: Tom Thumb
programme.desc: The adventures of a boy the size of a thumb, who is taken in by a kindly couple.(n)

programme.title: Wadjda
programme.desc: Wadjda is a 10-year-old girl living in a suburb of Riyadh, the capital of Saudi Arabia. Although she lives in a conservative world, Wadjda is fun loving, entrepreneurial and always pushing the boundaries of what she can get away with. After a fight with her friend Abdullah, a neighbourhood boy she shouldn't be playing with, Wadjda sees a beautiful green bicycle for sale. She wants the bicycle desperately so that she can beat Abdullah in a race. But Wadjda's mother won't allow it, fearing repercussions from a society that sees bicycles as dangerous to a girl's virtue. So Wadjda decides to try and raise the money herself. At first, Wadjda's mother is too preoccupied with convincing her husband not to take a second wife to realise what's going on. And soon enough Wadjda's plans are thwarted when she is caught running various schemes at school. Just as she is losing hope of raising enough money, she hears of a cash prize for a Koran recitation competition at her school. She devotes herself to the memorisation and recitation of Koranic verses, and her teachers begin to see Wadjda as a model pious girl. The competition isn't going to be easy, especially for a troublemaker like Wadjda, but she refuses to give in. She is determined to continue fighting for her dreams.(n)

programme.title: Belle And Sebastian 3
programme.desc: Sebastian tries to protect his beloved dog Belle from her previous owner.(n)

programme.title: The Ash Lad
programme.desc: Espen, 'Ash Lad', a poor farmer's son, embarks on a dangerous quest with his brothers to save a princess from a vile troll known as the Mountain King.(n)

programme.title: Capharnaum
programme.desc: After running away from his negligent parents, committing a violent crime, and being sentenced to five years in jail, a hardened 12-year-old Lebanese boy sues his parents for giving him life.(n)

programme.title: From Up on Poppy Hill
programme.desc: Set in Yokohama in 1963, this lovingly hand-drawn film centers on Umi (voiced by Sarah Bolger) and Shun (voiced by Anton Yelchin) and the budding romance that develops as they join forces to save their high school's ramshackle clubhouse from demolition. The top-grossing Japanese film of 2011 and winner of the Japan Academy Prize for Animation, From Up on Poppy Hill captures the innocence of new love as well as the beauty of Yokohama's harbor and lush surroundings.(n)

programme.title: Roald Dahl's Esio Trot
programme.desc: Esio Trot is a story about shy Mr Hoppy and his secret love for his neighbour, Mrs Silver, who he chats to over the balcony. This was one of Roald Dahl's last stories.(n)

programme.title: Alpha
programme.desc: An epic adventure set in the last Ice Age, 20,000 years ago. While on his first hunt, an initiation to his tribe's most elite group, a young man is injured and left for dead after a bison hunt goes horribly wrong. Awaking to find himself broken, alone, and miles from his village - he must learn to survive and navigate the harsh and unforgiving wilderness. Reluctantly taming a lone wolf abandoned by its pack, the pair learn to rely on each other to hunt and become unlikely allies, enduring countless dangers and overwhelming odds in order to find their way home before the deadly winter arrives.(n)

programme.title: The Ash Lad
programme.desc: Espen, 'Ash Lad', a poor farmer's son, embarks on a dangerous quest with his brothers to save a princess from a vile troll known as the Mountain King.(n)

programme.title: The Circle
programme.desc: A young tech worker takes a job at a powerful internet corporation. She soon comes to learn that her decisions and actions will determine the future of humanity.(n)

programme.title: Thunderbirds
programme.desc: Having narrowly averted a major disaster on an oil rig, the Thunderbirds have just returned home to their secret base when TB5, their space based station, is critically damaged in a suspected meteor strike. Unbeknown to them, the attack on TB5 is a deliberate ploy by international master criminal Aristotle Spode to get them off the island. He takes over the island and forces Brains into submission, using the power of his mind. But Spode has overlooked one key factor: Alan, Fermat and Tin Tin are still on the island.(n)

programme.title: Tom Thumb
programme.desc: The adventures of a boy the size of a thumb, who is taken in by a kindly couple.(n)

programme.title: Mermaid
programme.desc: Based on a true story. Four-year-old Desi learns to accept the death of her father by sending him a letter on a balloon to which she receives a reply. Stars Ellen Burstyn.(n)

programme.title: The Boxer
programme.desc: Emily Watson, Brian Cox. Released from prison for IRA activities, a one-time boxer tries to reclaim his life, but the militants have other ideas in this drama starring Daniel Day-Lewis.(n)

programme.title: Capharnaum
programme.desc: After running away from his negligent parents, committing a violent crime, and being sentenced to five years in jail, a hardened 12-year-old Lebanese boy sues his parents for giving him life.(n)

programme.title: Destination Flavour Singapore Bitesize
programme.desc: The best bits of Adam Liaw's travels in Singapore, as he explores its vibrant food scene.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine With Me Uk Couples
programme.desc: Join couples from across the United Kingdom as they attempt to host a perfect dinner party and compete for one thousand pounds in cash.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's French Odyssey
programme.desc: Award-winning chef Rick Stein returns to France for an idyllic gastronomic journey through the waterways of France, travelling by barge on the Canal du Midi from Bordeaux to Marseilles in search of the best food and wine the area has to offer. He waves goodbye to Padstow and boards the Plymouth to Roscoff ferry for the first stage of his journey, a leisurely tour of Brittany, known for its superb seafood.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's French Odyssey
programme.desc: At the Restaurant Le Grilladin des mers at Isle d'Oleron, Rick enjoys Clams in White Garlic Sauce, and savours the simple dish of freshly caught Eels cooked in Garlic Butter and Parsley. He whips up one of his favourite French meals, Petit Sale, a typical peasant dish of Salted Pork Belly and Lentils, before preparing a Steak Tartare in the ancient town of Bazas.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Spain
programme.desc: Rick's journey begins in Galicia - famous for pilgrims, rain, fog, fresh seafood, empanadas and more rain. He eats ?tortillas de patata' in the King of Spain's favourite restaurant and meets up with a couple of cool dudes who run a little restaurant in the old market of Santiago de Compostela. In neighbouring Asturias, he enjoys a cider festival at Gijon; samples the famous fabada - a hearty bean stew with sausage, belly pork and black pudding; and explores the making of Cabrales cheese in secret caves. Finally, in this program stuffed with goodness and jollity, Rick enters the Basque Country, where they like nothing better than to cook great fish dishes, drink local wine and sing.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: After Nico, owner of Capo's in Las Vegas, hears complaints that his brother and manager is acting inappropriately with guests, he sends in Charles Stiles to investigate. The Mystery Diners go undercover and discover a bigger problem with a disgruntled waiter who is stealing money and supplies from the restaurant.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: When two employees who recently broke up disrupt staff harmony and start affecting sales at Marche Bacchus in Las Vegas, owners Jeff and Rhonda seek Charles for help. The Mystery Diners go undercover to get to the bottom of this lovers' quarrel.(n)

programme.title: Donal's Kitchen Hero
programme.desc: Donal meets Marie O'Toole, a senior member of the ICA, for lunch. Marie tells Donal about the role the ICA has had in improving the lives of women in Ireland, teaching them how to grow plants and raise livestock. They discuss how the organisation campaigned for electrification and mains water in rural Ireland, and the impact the organisation has had on the food we eat today. In studio Donal prepares farmhouse-style terrine, and on Muckross Traditional Farms he learns how to grow potatoes in lazy beds and cooks potato yeast rolls in a bastible over an open fire.(n)

programme.title: The Cook's Pantry With Matt Sinclair
programme.desc: Matt shops for ingredients at the Noosa farmers market to make a spring vegetable salad, while Courtney cooks one of her childhood favourires - grilled flounder with butter sauce.(n)

programme.title: Lidia's Italy
programme.desc: Lidia travels to the Italian island of Sardegna where she catches fresh lobster for a refreshing salad filled with celery and tomatoes, in a light egg dressing.(n)

programme.title: Miguel's Feasts
programme.desc: Miguel heads off on a tropical food adventure, celebrates Aussie blueberry season, and shows us the best recipe for a sweet Queensland treat - the easiest cheesecake you'll ever make in your life.(n)

programme.title: Miguel's Feasts
programme.desc: Today, a whole new take on Fish and Chips, the secret to a delicious mushroom risotto, and Miguel discovers the perfect American BBQ companion - macaroni and cheese.(n)

programme.title: Sachie's Kitchen
programme.desc: Miso paste dates back more than a thousand years and has become a key ingredient in Japanese cuisine. Sachie travels to Nagano, the home of Marukome (the world's leading manufacturer of miso) where she gets to see how it's made.(n)

programme.title: Mercurio's Menu
programme.desc: Paul bounces along to the beautiful Kangaroo Island, packed full of family producers showing real imagination. No sooner are his feet on the ground than he's heading out to meet them all.(n)

programme.title: Mercurio's Menu
programme.desc: Paul ventures off-shore to visit New Zealand's capital, Wellington, where he takes a half-day tour to discover the best places to eat and drink in this compact city. Then, Paul's off out of the city to meet some local fisherman, lamb growers, and enjoy an annual wine and food fair.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: Maggie is famous for her pate. Here she shows us her coarse country pate while Simon creates a mushroom terrine.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: This week on The Cook and the Chef it's all about sweetness and light, in the form of sugar and glorious North Queensland sunshine. Maggie and Simon begin with a couple of racks:Maggie's rack of lamb and Simon's rack of sugarcane prawns : before getting down to some truly sweet stuff: Maggie bakes a delicious chocolate brownie with a sour cream parfait while Simon dazzles us with some sugar work.(n)

programme.title: Gok Cooks Chinese
programme.desc: Gok provides tips on how to cook dim sum, including chicken and leek dim sum.(n)

programme.title: Cooking Up A Fortune
programme.desc: It's the last day of the heats and one kitchen will win a place in the weekly final. Cooking today are Sassy and Ginger, The Geordie Grub Hub, and In Wonderland.(n)

programme.title: Cooking Up A Fortune
programme.desc: It's the finals and tentsions are high. Two winners from the heats - both pairs of sisters - are back to compete for the chance to try running their own business at one of the UK's busiest food arenas.(n)

programme.title: Beautiful Baking With Juliet Sear
programme.desc: Juliet creates edible Christmas gifts for friends and family. There are rosemary and parmesan shortbreads, charcoal Christmas tree crackers for cheese, mini Christmas pudding cake pops, and a build-your-own gingerbread wreath. Award winning chocolatier Paul A. Young joins Juliet to make his amazing rum butter chocolate brownies.(n)

programme.title: Destination Flavour Down Under Bitesize
programme.desc: Some of your favourite moments and recipes from Adam Liaw's culinary and cultural journey through Australia and New Zealand. (Commissioned by SBS) (Short) (Rpt) G.(n)

programme.title: Late Nite Eats
programme.desc: Jordan checks out Toronto, Canada's most diverse city, and it dishes out all kinds of delights. He kicks off his tour at Chanticler, a French style bistro located in Parkdale. Chef Colin Rayner blows Jordan's mind with a sophisticated take on fried chicken like none he's ever tried. He follows it up with Chanticler's elegant yet simple take on a cheese burger with pickles, their Royale with Cheese.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: Simon and Maggie show that fast and convenient food can be tasty and healthy. Maggie makes a scrumptious burger and Simon prepares a simple apple pie.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: Simon investigates Aussie TV chefs and cooks a Gordon Ramsey recipe while Maggie talks to Neil Perry and cooks her version of one of his dishes.(n)

programme.title: Cheese Slices
programme.desc: Artisan and hand-made farmhouse cheeses have been at the forefront of a growing consumer backlash against innocuous mass produced foods in the United States. Will travels to Northern California to find out more.(n)

programme.title: Cheese Slices
programme.desc: The Minas region of Brazil produces as much raw milk cheese as France, but most of it is illegal. Will takes a flight to the stunning Canastra ranges to learn about the traditional farm cheese and Pain de Quejo before heading further south to the remote Campos Altos region to discover a unique cheese made from the milk long horn cattle, and enjoys a traditional BBQ before returning to Sao Paulo for a lesson in grilling Coalho cheese.(n)

programme.title: Inside Heston's World
programme.desc: World-famous chef, Heston Blumenthal, prepares to move his three Michelin-starred restaurant, The Fat Duck, 10,000 miles from England to Australia. In this episode: an intimate portrayal of Heston's restaurant as the team prepare for an audacious six-month move to Australia; Head Chef Jonny Lake works out how to ship 64,000 snails to the other side of the world; the entire team is making the move but they must all pass an English language exam.(n)

programme.title: Pacific Island Food Revolution
programme.desc: Join host Robert Oliver as he heads to beautiful Vanuatu to meet the new contestants. Which of the three teams will make it to the finals.(n)

programme.title: Ainsley Eats The Streets

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Mississippi Adventure
programme.desc: The bikers are back in New Orleans, where Si tries to convince Dave to enjoy jazz. They also cook some classic local dishes such as jambalaya and gumbo.(n)

programme.title: Poh & Co. Bitesize
programme.desc: Step into the always delicious world of acclaimed cook, artist, and lover of life - Poh Ling Yeow.(n)

programme.title: Freddie Fries Down Under
programme.desc: Freddie Flintoff and his friend, writer Rob Penn, hit the Australian road for the last time as they head to Cairns. With a hurricane threatening to rain on their parade, the boys get stuck by competing against a champion white water rafter at one of the best extreme sports sites in the world. They visit Australia's greatest natural wonder, the Great Barrier Reef. But Fred is left less than impressed and not even a glamorous helicopter ride back to shore can cheer him up - especially as the storm sets in and it's a very bumpy ride. Fred milks one of the world's deadliest creatures and torments Rob with another - the box jellyfish. To finish their trip they camp out overnight in the oldest rainforest on the planet, Daintree National Park. But Freddie can't help but go out with a bang, as he serves up a final feast that they'll never forget - a bug banquet.(n)

programme.desc: All the best moments and bits from Destination Flavour China, led by famed chef and author Adam Liaw.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Mississippi Adventure
programme.desc: The bikers are back in New Orleans, where Si tries to convince Dave to enjoy jazz. They also cook some classic local dishes such as jambalaya and gumbo.(n)

programme.title: Poh & Co. Bitesize
programme.desc: Step into the always delicious world of acclaimed cook, artist, and lover of life - Poh Ling Yeow.(n)

programme.title: Freddie Fries Down Under
programme.desc: Freddie Flintoff and his friend, writer Rob Penn, hit the Australian road for the last time as they head to Cairns. With a hurricane threatening to rain on their parade, the boys get stuck by competing against a champion white water rafter at one of the best extreme sports sites in the world. They visit Australia's greatest natural wonder, the Great Barrier Reef. But Fred is left less than impressed and not even a glamorous helicopter ride back to shore can cheer him up - especially as the storm sets in and it's a very bumpy ride. Fred milks one of the world's deadliest creatures and torments Rob with another - the box jellyfish. To finish their trip they camp out overnight in the oldest rainforest on the planet, Daintree National Park. But Freddie can't help but go out with a bang, as he serves up a final feast that they'll never forget - a bug banquet.(n)

programme.desc: Some of your favourite moments and recipes from Adam Liaw's culinary and cultural journey through Australia and New Zealand. (Commissioned by SBS) (Short) (Rpt) G.(n)

programme.title: Late Nite Eats
programme.desc: Jordan explores the Montreal scene and it doesn't disappoint. First, he heads to Notre Dame de Grace to try the late night discount menu at Monkland Tavern. Jordan falls in love with the braised calamari caponata, but his mind is blown by the many flavours in the soft shell crab banh mi. Next up, it's off to Moishe's, one of Montreal's oldest steak restaurants in Plateau Mont Royal. This 70 year old establishment is dishing out something new with its late night menu, and Jordan gets started with a superlative filet mignon poutine thats wowing the younger late night crowd.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: From restaurants to the street, Lebanese food has become a firm favourite with Australians. Maggie cooks chicken and pomegranate and Simon shares his secret to making great falafel.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: Maggie celebrates the unique food culture of her Barossa Valley with pickled pork while Simon joins in with his version of fritz.(n)

programme.title: For The Love Of Bread
programme.desc: Malta is known for its sun, sea, and simple way of life. Join Andrew Connole as he finds the best bakers and experiences the very best of local Maltese food.(n)

programme.title: In Search Of Umami
programme.desc: The Maillard reaction is the science describing the heat that forces interplay between proteins and sugars translating into colour, aroma, and flavour in Kuala Lumpur's claypot rice, char siu, and roti canai.(n)

programme.title: Sourced
programme.desc: Guy takes a trip on the floating markets of Thailand, gathers barnacles on the deadly cliffs of Portugal, and throws a drool-worthy feast in Melbourne.(n)

programme.title: Asia Unplated With Diana Chan
programme.desc: Laotian cuisine is packed with bold, balanced flavours. Reflective of surrounding countries such as Vietnam and Thailand, Laotian food also shares a balance of spicy, sour and sweet flavours, however, it is relatively unknown to many Australians. Diana shares Laotian recipes including sticky rice - a staple ingredient in Laotian cooking used to prepare one of her favourite street food snacks - khao jee. She explores popular flavours in Laos in a spicy pork sausage - sai oua - packed with vibrant herbs and spices. Diana is also joined in the kitchen by chef Jerry Mai who prepares salt crust grilled fish - a whole snapper filled with aromatics that celebrates Laos's fresh and vibrant flavours.(n)

programme.title: Wok Vs Pot With Marion And Silvia
programme.sub-title: Wok X Pot With Marion And Silvia Series 1 Ep 3
programme.desc: When it comes to traditional Italian and Thai food, you can't go past a classic bolognese and pad Thai. And what about everyone's favourite desserts - magical deep fried ice-cream and Italy's iconic tiramisu? Marion and Silivia share their recipes for their favourite traditional recipes.(n)

programme.title: Michela's Tuscan Kitchen
programme.desc: Michela explores the butchers, markets, and restaurants of Tuscany, where she discovers delectable local produce. Along with sister Emi, Michela serves pork with mango and peperoncino, then turns her attention to an easy cheats version of mushroom risotto made with porcini mushrooms, followed by a simple dessert of fresh roasted peaches and orange syrup.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Far Eastern Odyssey
programme.desc: Rick Stein visits Sri Lanka, where he discovers a wealth of hot and spicy vegetable curries. In Colombo, he meets Chef Publis, one the country's most respected chefs, and tastes an unforgettable chilli crab in a small Tamil eatery. Down in Galle, Rick discovers the delights of tea plantations and buffalo curd, and experiences first-hand the secrets of making cinnamon. Back at home, he creates a delicious cashew nut curry to savour the memories of his time in Sri Lanka. He then moves on, to the volcanic island of Bali, where food takes on a religious significance. Rick samples the best roast pork he has ever tasted. After buying fish straight off the day boats, he enjoys fresh barbecued fish on a beach. He ends his trip to Bali by taking part in a village ceremonial feast.(n)

programme.title: Top Of The Shop With Tom Kerridge
programme.desc: In this fourth heat, four food producers with fledgling sauce businesses come to test out their products on the locals in Malhamdale, in the heart of the Yorkshire Dales. They have two days in the shop to promote and sell their wares.(n)

programme.title: Gino's Italian Escape
programme.desc: Gino is back on the road again, leaving the mountains and heading south to the coast and the capital of Sardinia. On his way he takes a fishing trip and learns how fishing in the deep blue waters runs a close run, second to farming on this island. He then visits the bustling capital city of Cagliari, where he is introduced to the unique textures that the locals use to enhance their fish dishes. After a whistle stop shop at Europe's largest covered market, he makes his way to the magical ancient site of Nora, where he cooks a succulent tuna dish, as the sun sets over the ruins.(n)

programme.title: Gino's Italian Escape
programme.desc: Gino says arrivederci to Sardinia and arrives in the capital city of Sicily - Palermo. Sicily is somewhere Gino has never visited, so this is a real journey of discovery for him. Home of the mafia, a vibrant street food culture and rich history, this portside city stops Gino in his tracks. He has an unexpected encounter at the street food market, meets the man who stood up to the mafia, and ends up wine tasting in Marsala, finishing up his day in the vineyard cooking a beautiful chicken in marsala sauce.(n)

programme.title: Donal's Kitchen Hero
programme.desc: Donal visits Mary O'Rourke who taught English before she became a politician. She used Theodora's columns in the Irish Times as a teaching aid, believing that the stories and use of language would improve her own students' English. She talks about this to Donal, reads a couple of extracts from the paper, and discusses the food she ate growing up in Athlone.(n)

programme.title: Lidia's Italy
programme.desc: Lidia travels to Ligoria - a region all about flowers, herbs, and lot's of vegetables. With the help of her granddaughter Julia, Lidia creates a soup filled with lots of fresh vegetables. programme.title: Mercurio's Menu
programme.desc: Paul starts his trip through the Peninsula at Portarlington, which is famous for its mussels. On his return, Paul takes his catch over to the Ol' Duke restaurant where he shows us some simple ways to cook shellfish.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: This week Maggie takes us to the heart of Australia for the Alice Springs Desert Festival. Maggie was invited to the Festival to help judge one of its major events, the Wild food competition. Her experiences of the local foods became the inspiration behind this week's cooking, with both Maggie and Simon demonstrating different ways to cook the desert camel before enhancing cake and scones with the exotic coffee flavours of the wattle seed.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef

programme.title: Sky Super Rugby Aotearoa: Crusaders vs C
programme.sub-title: Sky Super Rugby Aotearoa Replay - Crusaders V Chiefs
programme.desc: Replay coverage of Sky Super Rugby Aotearoa 2021 as the Crusaders host the Chiefs at Orangetheory Stadium, Christchurch.(n)

programme.title: World's Wildest Holidays
programme.desc: PG-C One vacationer takes on a troupe of rampaging baboons busy trashing his house, and meet the English builder who vacations in the most dangerous places, including a KKK compound.(n)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: PG-C There's an air of betrayal at the Gold and Silver when an ancient Roman coin comes into the shop. Meanwhile, Chumlee goes post-apocalyptic over an original Mad Max movie poster.(n)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: PG-C A seller brings in boxes upon boxes of inherited comics, Rick looks at some rare turn of the century currency and Chumlee plays on an antique pinball machine.(n)

programme.title: Call The Cleaners
programme.desc: PG Maxine and Jasmine tackle a house with 30 years' worth of arts and crafts materials. Yvonne and Angela take on rubbish and dog poo. Steve faces a toilet that even he can't clean.(n)

programme.title: Rugby Nation
programme.desc: Join your host Karl Te Nana for the best highlights from the weekend's rugby.(n)

programme.title: Dream Home Dilemma
programme.desc: Californians Brandon and Abby moved here seven years ago, and now they're ready to buy their first NZ home. With a huge list of 'must-haves', the experts have their work cut out for them.(n)

programme.title: Prime News - First At 5.30
programme.desc: Join the Prime News team first at 5.30pm, for all the day's top current events, sports news and to see how the weather is in your region.(n)

programme.title: The Great Escapers
programme.desc: An adventure company deals with a nervous cliff jumper, and some Brits spend 2 years' worth of savings in just eight weeks!(n)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.sub-title: 'Pistol Is Mightier Than The Sword, The'
programme.desc: PG-C Rick takes a stab at a sword with an attached pistol from the 1700s. Will he hit the bullseye or shoot himself in the foot? Meanwhile, Corey gets revved up for a 1969 Harley.(n)

programme.title: Outback Truckers
programme.desc: PG-L Anthony and Danyelle Haigh enlist a new team member as life on the road puts their marriage to the test. Slick's cross country race home for Christmas looks to be slipping out of reach.(n)

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: PG-C On the 7th of August 1997, a cargo plane crashes just moments after taking off from Miami. Could an anonymous tip determine what went wrong?(n)

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: M-VC / AO Matty reveals a shocking secret to the team - she has a husband who's been undercover for eight years. When his cover is blown, Matty needs the team to extract him before it is too late.(n)

programme.title: SmackDown
programme.desc: PG-V WWE SmackDown is an edge-of-your-seat thrill ride for the entire family, featuring compelling characters and unmatched athleticism 52 weeks a year.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Salvage Squad
programme.desc: 16-L / AO Season 1 premiere: The team is called in to rescue a vessel stuck in a North Queensland mangrove. The only way they can get it out is to use the winch... but there's a problem!(n)

programme.title: Closedown
programme.desc: PG Prime's regular programming returns at 6am with the best drama, factual, lifestyle and comedy shows, plus free-to-air sport! Check out primetv.co.nz for details.(n)

programme.title: Jeopardy
programme.desc: This is fast paced general knowledge at its best! Jeopardy provides a test of literature, history, science, the arts, pop culture and more. Can you keep up?(n)

programme.title: Ready Set Dance
programme.desc: Freeze, Twirl, and the kids dance crew share some fun dance moves for grannies to get their groove on.(n)

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe
programme.desc: A fairy named Butterbean has adventures running the neighbourhood cafe with her friends, serving up healthy snacks and sweet treats to the residents in their community of Puddlebrook.(n)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.sub-title: Patching Things Up; Cheater By The Dozen
programme.desc: Lola and Lana try out for Bluebell Scouts. Lincoln and Clyde think Bobby is cheating on Lori.(n)

programme.title: Ben 10: Omniverse
programme.desc: With the help from a new alien partner, Ben explores the alien underground and discovers enemies from his past, all while a mysterious hunter is hot on his trail.(n)

programme.title: Danger Mouse
programme.desc: Catch the adventures of Danger Mouse, the world's greatest secret agent and his hamster sidekick Penfold. Wherever there is danger, he will be there!(n)

programme.title: A Place In The Sun: Winter Sun

programme.title: The Doctors

programme.title: Hot Bench

programme.title: Endeavour

programme.title: الخوابي
Alkhawabi
programme.desc: يقدم المسلسل مجموعة مختلفة من قصص الريف الفلسطيني، متناولا العديد من القيم الإنسانية والتاريخية التي مر بها الإنسان العربي والأردني على الأخص.(n)

programme.title: زواج بالإكراه
Zawaj Bil Ikrah
programme.desc: (ليلى) شابّة ثرية تتعرَّض لحادثة مرورية تنزف إثرها وتحتاج إلى نقل دم سريع، يتصادف أن تتطابق فصيلة دمها مع فصيلة دم سائقها الخاص، ينقل لها دمًا منه دون أن يعلم أنه هو نفسه مريض بالإيدز وينتقل إليها المرض، تنقلب حياة الشابة إلى تعاسة وانتظار للموت، وتحب شابًّا جديدًا في شركة أبيها اسمه (أحمد)، لكنه لا يبادلها الحب؛ لأنه يحب (هند) التي هو على وشك الزواج بها، يقوم والدها (سعيد الكومي) بتهديده بقتل خطيبته وأقاربه حتى يجبره على الزواج من ابنته المريضة بالإيدز، وتتوالى الأحداث.(n)

programme.title: آدم
Adam
programme.desc: آدم شاب فقير من بيئة شعبية، يُتهم والده بتقاضي رشوة، فيصبح آدم عائل الأسرة المكونة من والدته، وأشقائه فتضطره الظروف للعمل كعامل توصيل للطلبات. تربطه علاقة حب بجارته هنا التي يرفض والدها زواجه منها. وفي إحدى المرات يرى رجلًا أمريكيًا يحاول التهجم على الفتاة نانسي فيقتله للدفاع عن نفسه وعن الفتاة.(n)

programme.title: أمير الليل
Amir Al-Layl
programme.desc: تدور أحداث المسلسل حول سحر وغموض شخصية (الأمير عمر)، وتمرد وعنفوان شخصية شقيقة زوجته المريضة (فرح)، كل هذا خلال حقبة تاريخيّة مهمّة من تاريخ لبنان في زمن الإنتداب، ويمتد بالحقبة حتى أواخر ثلاثينيّات القرن الماضي، كما يُظهر قصور الأمراء وبيوت قُرى لبنان.(n)

programme.title: شاهد عيان
Shahid Eian
programme.desc: تدور الأحداث في إطار درامي، حول حياة ضابط شرطة ومحاولاته في البحث عن زوجته الصحفية ندى بعد اختفائها وأوهام الخاطفين له بأنها قُتلت.(n)

programme.title: الخوابي
Alkhawabi
programme.desc: يقدم المسلسل مجموعة مختلفة من قصص الريف الفلسطيني، متناولا العديد من القيم الإنسانية والتاريخية التي مر بها الإنسان العربي والأردني على الأخص.(n)

programme.title: أمير الليل
Amir Al-Layl
programme.desc: تدور أحداث المسلسل حول سحر وغموض شخصية (الأمير عمر)، وتمرد وعنفوان شخصية شقيقة زوجته المريضة (فرح)، كل هذا خلال حقبة تاريخيّة مهمّة من تاريخ لبنان في زمن الإنتداب، ويمتد بالحقبة حتى أواخر ثلاثينيّات القرن الماضي، كما يُظهر قصور الأمراء وبيوت قُرى لبنان.(n)

programme.title: شاهد عيان
Shahid Eian
programme.desc: تدور الأحداث في إطار درامي، حول حياة ضابط شرطة ومحاولاته في البحث عن زوجته الصحفية ندى بعد اختفائها وأوهام الخاطفين له بأنها قُتلت.(n)

programme.title: الخوابي
Alkhawabi
programme.desc: يقدم المسلسل مجموعة مختلفة من قصص الريف الفلسطيني، متناولا العديد من القيم الإنسانية والتاريخية التي مر بها الإنسان العربي والأردني على الأخص.(n)

programme.title: زواج بالإكراه
Zawaj Bil Ikrah
programme.desc: (ليلى) شابّة ثرية تتعرَّض لحادثة مرورية تنزف إثرها وتحتاج إلى نقل دم سريع، يتصادف أن تتطابق فصيلة دمها مع فصيلة دم سائقها الخاص، ينقل لها دمًا منه دون أن يعلم أنه هو نفسه مريض بالإيدز وينتقل إليها المرض، تنقلب حياة الشابة إلى تعاسة وانتظار للموت، وتحب شابًّا جديدًا في شركة أبيها اسمه (أحمد)، لكنه لا يبادلها الحب؛ لأنه يحب (هند) التي هو على وشك الزواج بها، يقوم والدها (سعيد الكومي) بتهديده بقتل خطيبته وأقاربه حتى يجبره على الزواج من ابنته المريضة بالإيدز، وتتوالى الأحداث.(n)

programme.title: آدم
Adam
programme.desc: آدم شاب فقير من بيئة شعبية، يُتهم والده بتقاضي رشوة، فيصبح آدم عائل الأسرة المكونة من والدته، وأشقائه فتضطره الظروف للعمل كعامل توصيل للطلبات. تربطه علاقة حب بجارته هنا التي يرفض والدها زواجه منها. وفي إحدى المرات يرى رجلًا أمريكيًا يحاول التهجم على الفتاة نانسي فيقتله للدفاع عن نفسه وعن الفتاة.(n)

programme.title: أمير الليل
Amir Al-Layl
programme.desc: تدور أحداث المسلسل حول سحر وغموض شخصية (الأمير عمر)، وتمرد وعنفوان شخصية شقيقة زوجته المريضة (فرح)، كل هذا خلال حقبة تاريخيّة مهمّة من تاريخ لبنان في زمن الإنتداب، ويمتد بالحقبة حتى أواخر ثلاثينيّات القرن الماضي، كما يُظهر قصور الأمراء وبيوت قُرى لبنان.(n)

programme.title: شاهد عيان
Shahid Eian
programme.desc: تدور الأحداث في إطار درامي، حول حياة ضابط شرطة ومحاولاته في البحث عن زوجته الصحفية ندى بعد اختفائها وأوهام الخاطفين له بأنها قُتلت.(n)

programme.title: الخوابي
Alkhawabi
programme.desc: يقدم المسلسل مجموعة مختلفة من قصص الريف الفلسطيني، متناولا العديد من القيم الإنسانية والتاريخية التي مر بها الإنسان العربي والأردني على الأخص.(n)

programme.title: زواج بالإكراه
Zawaj Bil Ikrah
programme.desc: (ليلى) شابّة ثرية تتعرَّض لحادثة مرورية تنزف إثرها وتحتاج إلى نقل دم سريع، يتصادف أن تتطابق فصيلة دمها مع فصيلة دم سائقها الخاص، ينقل لها دمًا منه دون أن يعلم أنه هو نفسه مريض بالإيدز وينتقل إليها المرض، تنقلب حياة الشابة إلى تعاسة وانتظار للموت، وتحب شابًّا جديدًا في شركة أبيها اسمه (أحمد)، لكنه لا يبادلها الحب؛ لأنه يحب (هند) التي هو على وشك الزواج بها، يقوم والدها (سعيد الكومي) بتهديده بقتل خطيبته وأقاربه حتى يجبره على الزواج من ابنته المريضة بالإيدز، وتتوالى الأحداث.(n)

programme.title: آدم
Adam
programme.desc: آدم شاب فقير من بيئة شعبية، يُتهم والده بتقاضي رشوة، فيصبح آدم عائل الأسرة المكونة من والدته، وأشقائه فتضطره الظروف للعمل كعامل توصيل للطلبات. تربطه علاقة حب بجارته هنا التي يرفض والدها زواجه منها. وفي إحدى المرات يرى رجلًا أمريكيًا يحاول التهجم على الفتاة نانسي فيقتله للدفاع عن نفسه وعن الفتاة.(n)
